subject: Re: [junit] How to determine what the error is when running a JUnit test via Ant?
msgSnippet: James, Can you show us what your junit and junitreport calls in ant s build file looks like? Regards, Jan ... From: james_adams  To:
messageBody:
James,

Can you show us what your junit and junitreport calls
in ant's build file
looks like?

Regards, Jan


----- Original Message -----
From: "james_adams" <james_adams@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 23, 2006 1:45 AM
Subject: [junit] How to determine what the error is
when running a JUnit
test via Ant?


> I'm running a JUnit test via Ant's <junit> task. It
completes with an
> error, but I have yet to determine what the error
is. I have tried
> using the <record> Ant task with a debug loglevel to
create a log
> file, and I've tried using the <junitreport> task to
create an HTML
> report of the test run, neither of which has
resulted in anything
> which gives me a clue as to what the error is. Can
someone suggest
> another approach?
>
> Thanks in advance for any suggestions.
>
>
> --James
